roleset.name: say for all to hear

example.name: announce-v: transitive
example.text: A Lorillard spokeswoman announced " This is an old story . "

example.name: announce-v: fronted
example.text: Kent cigarettes were sold , the company announced

example.name: announce-v: Inverted
example.text: What matters is what advertisers will pay , announced Newsweek 's chairman

propbank.arg: What matters is what advertisers will pay

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: In early September the MOFA announced that , based on efficiency evaluations , the government would close its representative offices in the African countries of the Congo , Angola , and Madagascar .

propbank.arg: that , based on efficiency evaluations , the government would close its representative offices in the African countries of the Congo , Angola , and Madagascar

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: In the case of the Dominican Republic , for example , supporters of President Mejia announced to the media on the eve of President Chen 's arrival that mainland China was planning to build a large thermal power plant in their country .

propbank.arg: In the case of the Dominican Republic
on the eve of President Chen 's arrival
that mainland China was planning to build a large thermal power plant in their country

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG3
example.text: Even the one we thought was foolish announced mourning on Sadam 's death .

propbank.arg: Even the one we thought was foolish

example.name: ARG1
example.text: After the ruling was announced , the ruling and opposition camps both declared victory and eventually negotiated an agreement on the question of whether Lien Chan would be allowed to serve as premier .

example.name: announcement-n: Fragment, args 0 & 1
example.text: a vitriolic U.S. response to Sony Corp. 's announcement of its purchase of Columbia Pictures Entertainment Inc.

propbank.arg: of its purchase of Columbia Pictures Entertainment Inc.

example.name: announcement-n: Arg 1 only
example.text: Announcements of local births , deaths and weddings can be found in the daily newspaper .

propbank.arg: of local births , deaths and weddings

example.name: announcement-n: All arguments, referring to babies
example.text: Doing your best to keep him or her occupied and busy in your lap is the most effective way to minimize his or her announcement of discomfort to everyone .

example.name: do_announcing-l
example.text: I 'm still doing my TV announcing and my weekend radio stuff , so that money will help .

example.name: annunciation-n
example.text: And what makes this feature in his character still more remarkable is a difference which we trace between his annunciation of the truths which he brought from heaven and his allusions to his own experiences .

propbank.arg: of the truths which he brought from heaven

example.name: make_announcement-l
example.text: It was just before the sun set one day when everyone was sitting around talking at Susie Mae 's house when Clyde T. made the announcement that he was going to get married

propbank.arg: that he was going to get married

roleset.note: ANNOUNCE-V NOTES: Based on Big Corpus, comparison to 'say'. Member of Vncls reflexive_appearance-48.1.2, say-37.7-1 (from announce.01-v)
ANNOUNCEMENT-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb announce.01, OntoNotes grouping announcement-n senses 1 & 2; Maps to VN classes reflexive_appearance-48.1.2 and say-37.7-1. (from announcement.01-n)
